segments.text: Yes . We've got plenty of tables in stock . Will you have a look at this one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's a nice color , and the style is not bad , but a bit too small . I'd like to get a slightly larger one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmm , I like it . How much is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is the money . Could you deliver this to my house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . We are always at your service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is my name card . Thanks .
segments.speaker: S1
